info.name: Dark grey and blue OkCupid
info.description:
This style turns OkCupid into a darkish grey and blue color scheme.  Also removes the ad that shows up when using adblock plus, this was difficult and may remove other things as a result but i haven't noticed anything.

Please leave feedback be it positive/negative or stuff i missed to change.
info.additionalInfo:
NOTE: images and screennames have been obscured.

15/10/26
v6 - a few changes: (code changed for browse and quickmatch)
 * applied dark background to match cards in browse
 * applied dark background to sort by in browse
 * applied dark background to match cards in quickmatch

Note: login/logout page and various other dropdowns still white due to new update, will fix later.

14/12/30
v5 - minor changes:
 * removed new ad at top of page
 * removed new ad on home page

14/11/01
v4 - a bunch of fixes and additions: (should work better with future okcupid updates)
 * removed most of the positioning hacks for much cleaner code
 * changed how ads were removed to fix positioning issues
 * added dark colors to many options previously missed

14/07/03
v3 - a bunch of tweeks including:
 * applied dark to the homepage (missed it cause i'm always logged in)
 * applied dark to login popup (missed it cause i'm always logged in)
 * applied dark to logout page (missed it cause i'm always logged in)
 * applied dark to background color when hiding someone
 * applied dark to box that show up when hovering on peoples images on welcome page
 * applied dark to a bunch of buttons on various pages
 * applied dark to find a user popup
 * fixed header padding issue should not conflict with content less and look cleaner
 * hid a box shadow that showed around people when using browse
 * hid a box shadow that showed under peoples images on welcome page
 * also many minor adjustments here and there

14/07/02
v2 - updated due to changes on OkCupid.  improved almost all the issues that were introduced and that were left over from v1.  i'm sure i still missed some stuff, but it will get done eventually.

??/??/??
v1 - initial version
